tools.name: Box the Compass
tools.action: Grounding: 4 objects seen, 3 touched, 2 heard, 1 smelled.

tools.name: 15-Minute Audit
tools.action: Pick one tiny chore. Timer for 15 mins. Focus only on that.

tools.name: Legacy Drafting
tools.action: Identify one trait from the loss you respect; act on it today.

tools.name: External Output
tools.action: 20 mins high-intensity movement. No audio. Process through the body.
